SmartSandwich: This innovative sandwich toaster uses AI to detect the type of bread and filling in the sandwich and adjusts the toasting time and temperature accordingly. It also suggests different toppings and combinations based on the user's preferences.

Sandwich Sous Chef: This smart toaster comes with a built-in chef assistant that helps users create the perfect sandwich by providing step-by-step instructions and suggestions for toppings, cheese melting, and cooking time.

Toast-o-Matic: This futuristic toaster features a built-in scanner that analyzes the sandwich's nutritional content and provides users with personalized health recommendations. It also offers different toasting settings for different types of bread and fillings.

Sandwich Genie: This magical toaster grants users' sandwich wishes by automatically detecting the type of bread and filling and toasting it to perfection. It also offers suggestions for new and exciting sandwich combinations based on the user's preferences.

Toast-a-Tron 3000: This advanced toaster features a built-in sensory system that detects the moisture and texture of the bread and filling, adjusting the toasting time and temperature accordingly. It also offers a variety of customizable settings and settings for different types of bread and fillings.
